The resemblance goes a lot deeper, even More so if one allows for small orthographic corrections to the modern reading, especially concerning the odd modern Hindu „dangling i“ which was just an ordinary fi : पि ﬀi

पि ⇔ ƒᶱ ⇔ þ

Both पि पी and should be transcribed as fi and fi, namely fphi and phfi or fi+p and p+fi, similar to the f in physics.
